GSD.description:
PM: hibernate: defer device probing when resuming from hibernation

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 003a456ae6f70bb97e436e02fc5105be577c1570. For more details please see the references link.
